description:
To open in the terminal, use

flatpak run org.vim.Vim
summary: useful if you are using Fedora SilverBlue

description: The learning curve may be a bit steep, but it is worth it.
summary: Still the most used utility on my machines

description: GVIM is a particularly useful enhancement as it delivers a functional, approachable GUI text editor with all the power and flexibility of vi while still enabling a full text-console implementation.
summary: Puts the power of vi in a GUI -- what's not to like?!

description: insupportable a prendre en main... mais meilleurs éditeur de texte passé une-deux semaines
summary: la prise en main est dure
